summary: An estranged couple try to fix their marriage on a road trip to a relative's funeral. However when memories and secrets from the past are revealed, a lot more is at stake than their relationship.
cast: Genevieve Nnaji|Oris Erhuero|Chioma Omeruah|Baaj Adebule|Lilian Afegbai|Joel Benson|Ify Brown|Dick Shawn Charles|Kachi Kyle Egbedo|Ayo Falana|Lord Frank|Ieoma Ibeawuchi|Nancy Isime|Gilt Janet|Afolabi Mathew|Majid Michel|Bolanle Ninalowo|Marchie Nkem|Augustine Nonyeluy|Ihuoma Nwigwe|Merit Ocha|Jessica Okanfawon|Adeyemi Okanlawon|Ebele Okaro-Onyiuke|Frances Okeke|Meg Otanwa|Christian Paul|Cosby Tammy|Chima Temple|Meme Tom|Barak Uche|David Valentino|Chinedu Victor|Jonathan Williams
title: Road to Yesterday
